title: How to set group ringtones
answer:
Enter Contact, select the group tab, select a group added with group members, click to enter the details screen, and click the ringtone option to select the required group ringtones. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110025) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110026)
